footer.content: The successful implementation of this project has the potential to revolutionize various industries that heavily rely on image analysis, leading to enhanced productivity and decision-making capabilities.
footer.address-content: Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Park Km29 Thang Long Avenue, Thach That District, Hanoi
mainbanner.title: Enhance Customer Experience with Virtual Try-on system using a 2D Camera
feature.cs.content: Computer vision is a field of (AI) that enables computers and systems to derive meaningful information from digital images, trains machines to perform these functions, but it has to do it in much less time with cameras, data and algorithms rather than retinas, optic nerves and a visual cortex
feature.nlp.content: NLP is a branch of artificial intelligence that deals with analyzing, understanding and generating the languages that humans use naturally in order to interface with computers in both written and spoken contexts using natural human languages instead of computer languages.
feature.robot.content: Robotics is a branch of engineering and science that includes electronics engineering, mechanical engineering and computer science and so on. This branch deals with the design, construction, use to control robots, sensory feedback and information processing.
about.title: About us
about.title2: We Complete Every Project With Extra Care As Customer Need
about.content: We always complete the work that customers need, With a team of quality engineers we always apply new technologies, and always have criteria to bring benefits to customers such as:
whychooseus.title: Why Choose Us
whychooseus.content: Our platform brings you the most realistic AI experience results.
whychooseus.safecontent: We always ensure absolute safety for users when using APIs and SDKs, do not arbitrarily use user data, comply with policy.
whychooseus.techsupcontent: We are always ready to support when you use such as updating versions and carefully detailing the specific SDk docs.
whychooseus.livesupcontent: We are always ready to help as much as we can by calling to exchange information directly with a team of experienced developers.
service.content: We develop and apply modern advanced AI technology in face recognition, facial beautification, body recognition with high accuracy andfast processing speed and packaged it into a built-in SDK on the Android and Ios
service.content-1: Face Detection, Face Analysis, Face Verification, Face Searching.
service.content-2: Body Detection, Skeleton Detection, Body Outline.
service.content-3: Face Merging, Face Smooth, Face Cartoon, Facen Makeup.
myb: Make Your Business More Competitive And Enduring
myb.business: AI Will Automate Detect Face and Analyze
myb.business2: Along with the development of modern technology today, we have researched and developed facial recognition that is very useful when applied to businesses and individual users.
myb.business3: A Community With A Unique Mission
myb.business4: Our only mission is to satisfy businesses who want to apply advanced technology to optimize work productivity, bring great economic benefits.
offer.title: Industries and Project We Serve
offer.content: We have made a lot of practical AI products for users in Vietnam as well as promoting development to the world.
offer.project2: Evaluate the quality of real estate brokerage
offer.project3: Doji Smart Tryon, E-Catelog and FaceAI
offer.project.content: We developed a robot named Pepper that communicates with customers and greets them at the showroom of Doji smart.
industry.content2: We have been developing the 'VITON' project that evaluates the quality of real estate agents through pre-recorded videos. We analyze by comparing close sentences using NLP and hide customer information such as hiding name and phone number.
industry.content3: We in the same project Doji have integrated a project called 'TryOn' that allows people who come to Doji to experience the product through the Ipad screen.
